repnme.cdata!:
India - Thirteenth Industrial Credit and
            Investment Corporation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Thirteenth Industrial Credit and
            Investment Project will finance the foreign exchange cost of
            industrial projects carried out by productive enterprises in
            India. It will assist ICICI in diversifying its sources of
            foreign exchange by facilitating blending of Bank and
            commercial funds, and in promoting developmental activities.
            By helping to fill a gap in the availability of foreign
            exchange resources to finance capital goods imports, the
            project will contribute to investment in the modernization
            and expansion of productive industrial capacity in India.
            The risks associated with the project are minimal due to the
            strong management and experience of ICICI.

docna.cdata!:
India - Thirteenth Industrial Credit and
            Investment Corporation Project

display_title.display_title:
India - Thirteenth Industrial
            Credit and Investment Corporation Project
